meta_info.name: ITEM_LIST
meta_info.description: Logical list data structure, where each item has a value and can be referred to by a name and a positional index in the list. The list may be empty.

functions.name: names
functions.meaning: Retrieve the names of all items.

functions.name: ith_item
functions.meaning: Retrieve the i-th item with name.

functions.name: as_hierarchy
functions.meaning: Generate a CEN EN13606-compatible hierarchy consisting of a single `CLUSTER` containing the `ELEMENTs` of this list.
